question: Kathmandu ko population kati cha?
context: Nepal ko Kathmandu sahar ko population 2022 ko ankada anusar karib 1.5 million cha. Yo sahar Nepal ko rajdhani ho ra samyukta sanskritik thau haru ko liyera bishesh cha.
answer: Kathmandu ko population 1.5 million ho.

question: Mount Everest ko unchai kati ho?
context: Mount Everest, jun sansarma sabai bhanda uncha chuchuro ho, ko unchai 8848.86 meter cha. Yo sagarmatha ra chomolungma pani bhanincha.
answer: Mount Everest ko unchai 8848.86 meter ho.

question: Pashupatinath mandir kata cha?
context: Pashupatinath mandir Kathmandu, Nepal ma cha. Yo mandir Hindu dharma ko mahatwapurna thau ho ra Vishwako dharmik sthalaharu ma ek ho.
answer: Pashupatinath mandir Kathmandu ma cha.

question: Nepal ko rajdhani kata ho?
context: Nepal ko rajdhani Kathmandu ho. Kathmandu sahar Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo sahar pani ho ra ya jatiya bibidhata dekhincha.
answer: Nepal ko rajdhani Kathmandu ho.

question: Pokhara ma ke ke famous cha?

answer: Pokhara ma Fewa taal, Mahendra gufa, Bindyabasini mandir ra sarangkot famous cha.

question: Mero order ko status k ho?
context: Order status ko barema janakari ko lagi, hami le hamesha 'My Orders' section ma tapaiko order ko sabai update rakhdai aayeko cha. Tapaiko order #12345 ko status 'Shipped' cha. question: Refund process garna kasto time lagcha?
context: Refund process ko barema janakari ko lagi: Tapaiko order refund ko lagi eligibility check huncha, jasma order cancel garne ya return garne kaaran ko review garincha. Refund process suru hunay pachi hami le tapaiko refund 7-10 working din bhitra original payment method ma transfer garchau. Debit/credit card ko lagi processing bank le samaya lagcha. Wallet users ko lagi refund turunta huncha. Tapaiko refund request ID: RF123456 hami le 8th January 2025 ma receive gareko thiyau, ra yo abastama processing ma cha. Refund ma kunai samasya aayeko cha bhane, kripaya hami sanga turuntai samparka garnuhos.
answer: Refund process 7-10 working din lagcha. Tapaiko request processing ma cha.

question: Product exchange garna milcha?
context: Exchange policy: Exchange request product delivery ko 10 din bhitra garna parcha. Product exchange garna product unused ra original packaging ma hunu parcha. Exchange process start garna 'My Orders' section ma janera 'Request Exchange' button click garnuhos. Tapaiko request hami le 48 ghanta bhitra review garchau. Exchange approval pachi, hami le 5 din bhitra naya product dispatch garna suru garchau. Delivery timeline hami le courier partner ko samayama nirbhar garera finalize garchau. Tapaiko current order eligible cha bhane, yo process turunta start garna saknuhuncha.
answer: Product exchange garna milcha, tara 10 din bhitra request garnu parcha.

question: Warranty claim garna ke garnu parcha?
context: Warranty claim ko lagi, tapaiko product le manufacturer warranty ko terms meet garnu parcha. Invoice ko copy, product defect ko photo/video ra order ID provide garnu parcha. Warranty claim ko lagi, tapaiko request hami le receive gareko 24-48 ghanta bhitra process huncha. Manufacturer le warranty request approve garna turunta samparka garcha. Product replacement ya repair ko lagi, aba 7 din sama samaya lagna sakcha. Tapaiko warranty request ID: WC98765 ko status update ma email ra SMS pathaune garchau. Kripaya aba ko samaya ma email check garna nabirsanuhos.
answer: Warranty claim garna invoice ra defect ko photo pathaunu parcha. Process 7 din ma complete huncha.

question: Return policy ke cha?
context: Hami le transparent return policy ko lagi commitment gareka chau. Product return ko lagi 15 din ko samaya diinchau, tara product original condition ma hunu parcha. Return request suru garna 'My Orders' section ma 'Request Return' button click garnuhos. Return pickup service free cha, tara remote areas ma kunai courier charges applicable huncha. Return approval bhayepachi hami le 7 working din bhitra refund process garchau. Refund original payment method ma huncha. Digital wallet users ko lagi refund process faster huncha. Return policy ka details 'Terms & Conditions' section ma pani available cha.
answer: 15 din bhitra product return garna milcha, original condition ma hunu parcha.

question: Gift wrap option available cha?

answer: Gift wrap option available cha, Rs. 50 ko charge sath.

question: Bulk order discount cha?
context: Bulk order ka lagi hami le customized pricing ra discount options provide garchau. Minimum 10 units ko order hunuparcha bulk discount claim garna. question: Subscription pause garna milcha?
context: Subscription pause garna hami le tapaiko 'Account Settings' ma option provide gareka chau. Subscription pause ko lagi maximum 3 mahina samma limit cha. Pause ko samaya ma billing suspend huncha, tara pause pachi service automatically resume huncha. answer: Subscription 3 mahina samma pause garna milcha, billing suspend huncha.

question: Home loan ko interest rate kati cha?
context: Hami le home loan ko lagi competitive interest rates provide gareka chau. Interest rate loan amount, tenure, ra credit score ko aadhar ma vary huncha. question: Tax filing ko deadline k ho?
context: Tax filing ko lagi hami le official website ma details update gareka chau. Individual taxpayers ko lagi filing deadline 31st March 2025 cha. Late filing ko lagi penalty applicable huncha, ra interest per day charge huncha. Required documents ma Form 16, income proof, ra investment details sammilit huncha. Tax consultant ko assistance cha bhane, hami ko helpline dwara samparka garna milcha. Filing process complete bhayepachi confirmation email provide garincha.
answer: Tax filing ko deadline 31st March 2025 ho. Late filing ma penalty lagcha.

question: Data plan auto-renew off kasari garne?
context: Data plan auto-renew off garna 'Manage Subscriptions' section ma janera toggle button off garnuhos. Auto-renew disable bhayepachi, current plan expire bhaye pachi renewal stop huncha. Tapaiko data plan ID: DP98765 currently active cha, ra renewal 20th January 2025 ma schedule cha. Plan renew garna chahanu huncha bhane, manually recharge garna milcha. Plan related kunai confusion cha bhane, 24/7 customer support available cha.
answer: Data plan auto-renew 'Manage Subscriptions' ma toggle off garera disable garna milcha.

question: Online order ko delivery delay cha, ke garne?
context: Online order delivery delay ko lagi hami le 'Track Order' section provide gareka chau. Tapaiko order ID: ORD987654 ko delivery estimated date 15th January 2025 ho, tara logistics partner sanga delay update aaye ko cha. Compensation ya refund ko lagi complaint 'Support' section ma register garna parcha. Hami le complaint ID generate garepachi 5-7 working days ma inquiry garchau. Temporary solution ko lagi, alternate product select garna 'Product Replacement' option available cha.
answer: Delivery delay cha bhane 'Track Order' section ma status check garnuhos, ya 'Support' section ma complaint garna milcha.

question: Electric vehicle charging station kasaile book garne?
context: Electric vehicle (EV) charging station book garna 'Charging Stations' app ma janera nearest station select garnuhos. Booking ID generate bhayepachi 30 minutes samma slot reserve huncha. Tapaiko EV ID: EV12345 ko charging session 11th January 2025 ma confirmed cha. Payment session complete bhayepachi, receipt download option available huncha. Kunai slot conflict cha bhane, hami le alternate timing suggest garchau.
answer: EV charging station 'Charging Stations' app bata book garna saknuhuncha, slot reserve 30 minutes samma huncha.

question: Stock market account kasari kholne?
context: Stock market account kholna hami le 'Investment Services' portal provide gareka chau. Required documents ma PAN card, address proof, ra bank statement sammilit cha. Application form fill garisakepachi account ID generate huncha. Tapaiko application ID: STOCK123456 abastama review ma cha, ra 5-7 working days ma activation expected cha. Online trading platform access pachi stock research tools pani available huncha.
answer: Stock market account 'Investment Services' portal ma documents upload garera kholna saknuhuncha.

question: E-wallet balance kasari refund garne?
context: E-wallet balance refund garna hami le 'Transactions' section ma refund request option rakheko chau. Tapaiko wallet ID: WAL123456 ko pending balance Rs. 1500 ho. Refund request submit garisakepachi, bank account details verify garnu parcha. Refund process complete hunalai 3-5 working days lagna sakcha. Kunai error cha bhane, screenshot attach garera complaint raise garnuhos.
answer: E-wallet refund 'Transactions' section ma request garera bank account verify garna parcha.

question: Prepaid meter recharge kasari garne?
context: Prepaid meter recharge garna hami le 'Electricity Services' section ma option provide gareka chau. Meter ID enter garera recharge amount select garnuhos. Payment confirmation pachi recharge token generate huncha, jaslai meter ma enter garna parcha. Tapaiko prepaid meter ID: PRE123456 ko recharge pending cha, ra balance low notification 9th January 2025 ma pathauncha. Timely recharge na gare ko condition ma supply automatically suspend huncha.
answer: Prepaid meter recharge 'Electricity Services' section ma token generate garera meter ma enter garna parcha.

question: Travel visa apply garna process kasto cha?
context: Travel visa apply garna hami le 'Visa Assistance' portal rakheko chau. Required documents ma passport, photo, flight itinerary, ra financial proof huncha. Application ID generate pachi processing time 7-10 working days lagcha. Tapaiko visa application ID: VISA12345 abastama processing cha. Updates ko lagi SMS ya email dwara janakari pathaune garchau. Urgent processing cha bhane, additional fees lagna sakcha.
answer: Travel visa apply 'Visa Assistance' portal ma documents upload garera process suru garna milcha.

question: Gym ko trainer personal session kasari book garne?
context: Gym trainer ko personal session book garna 'Trainer Booking' section ma trainer ko profile select garnuhos. Availability calendar check garepachi preferred time book garna saknuhuncha. Tapaiko membership ID: GYM123456 ko current package ma 5 free sessions include cha. Additional sessions ko lagi Rs. 1000 per hour charge lagcha. Booking pachi confirmation SMS ya email pathaune huncha.
answer: Personal training session 'Trainer Booking' section ma profile ra time select garera book garna milcha.

question: Cloud storage ko backup kasari setup garne?
context: Cloud storage backup setup ko lagi hami le 'Settings' section ma option provide gareka chau. Tapaiko account ID: CLOUD123456 ma 50 GB free storage available cha. Automatic backup enable garnu ko lagi device folder select garnuhos. Backup complete bhayepachi confirmation notification pathaune garincha. Additional storage ko lagi subscription upgrade garna milcha.
answer: Cloud storage backup 'Settings' ma folder select ra automatic backup enable garera setup garna milcha.

question: Bike loan payment due cha, aba ke garne?
context: Bike loan payment due cha bhane 'Loan Services' section ma login garera overdue amount pay garnuhos. Late payment ko lagi 2% penalty applicable huncha. Tapaiko loan ID: BIKE987654 ko due Rs. 15,000 ho, ra late fee Rs. 300 add bhaeko cha. Payment complete garisakepachi updated schedule generate huncha. Kunai assistance cha bhane, hami ko customer helpline ma contact garnuhos.
answer: Bike loan due 'Loan Services' section ma overdue amount pay garera clear garna milcha.

question: Digital certificate kasari verify garne?
context: Digital certificate verify garna hami le 'Verification Services' section ma unique certificate ID enter garne system provide gareka chau. Tapaiko certificate ID: CERT987654 ko validity 31st December 2025 samma cha. Verification result download ko lagi PDF format option available cha. Unauthorized certificate paaye contact email dwara complaint raise garna saknuhuncha.
answer: Digital certificate verify 'Verification Services' ma certificate ID enter garera garna milcha.

question: Mero life insurance premium due cha, kasari pay garne?
context: Life insurance premium pay garna hami le 'Policy Services' section provide gareka chau. Tapaiko policy ID: LIFE123456 ko premium Rs. 15,000 yearly ho, ra due date 20th January 2025 cha. Late payment ma 1% penalty charge lagcha. Online payment options jasto ki net banking, UPI, ya debit card available cha. Payment receipt generate bhayepachi, tapaiko email ma automatically send garincha. Policy lapse prevent garna, timely payment mandatory cha.
answer: Life insurance premium 'Policy Services' section ma online pay garna milcha. Late payment ma penalty lagcha.

question: Student loan ko EMI postpone garna milcha?
context: Student loan EMI postpone garna, 'Loan Management' portal ma 'Request Deferment' option select garnuhos. Deferment ko lagi valid reason, documents (e.g., financial hardship proof), ra loan officer ko approval chaheko cha. Tapaiko loan ID: STUD123456 ko current EMI Rs. 8,000 monthly ho, ra next due date 10th February 2025 cha. Deferment approved bhaye 3 mahina samma EMI suspend garna milcha, tara additional interest accumulate huncha.
answer: Student loan EMI postpone 'Loan Management' portal ma request ra valid documents upload garera garna milcha.

question: Home loan interest rate reduce garna request garna milcha?
context: Home loan ko interest rate reduce garna, 'Rate Revision Request' option 'Loan Services' portal ma available cha. Required criteria include consistent repayment history, updated credit score, ra competitive market rates ko comparison. Tapaiko home loan ID: HOME12345 ko current interest rate 8.5% annually ho, ra revision request process 7-10 working days ma complete huncha. Request approve bhaye pachi, updated EMI schedule pathaune garchau.
answer: Home loan interest rate reduce 'Loan Services' portal ma request garna milcha, criteria fullfilled hunuparcha.

question: International flight ticket reschedule garna milcha?
context: International flight ticket reschedule garna hami le 'My Flights' section provide gareka chau. Tapaiko booking ID: INT123456 ko flight 25th January 2025 ma scheduled cha, ra preferred reschedule date 28th January 2025 cha. Reschedule charges, fare difference, ra seat availability ko aadhar ma lagcha. Payment complete bhaye pachi, naya e-ticket tapaiko email ma send huncha. Reschedule deadline flight departure 24 ghanta agadi samma ho.
answer: International flight reschedule 'My Flights' section ma garna milcha, charges seat availability anusar huncha.

question: Electricity bill ko overcharge complaint kasari file garne?
context: Electricity bill overcharge complaint file garna 'Billing Issues' section ma complaint register garnuhos. Required details include bill ID, consumption history, ra overcharge ko proof. Tapaiko bill ID: BILL123456 ko current bill Rs. 5,000 ho, tara previous average Rs. 3,000 monthly thiyo. Complaint ID generate bhayepachi 15 working days ma inquiry complete huncha. Overcharge confirm bhaye pachi, refund next bill ma adjust garincha.
answer: Electricity bill overcharge complaint 'Billing Issues' section ma file garna milcha, proof submit garnuhos.

question: Mobile app ma login problem solve kasari garne?
context: Mobile app login problem ko lagi, 'Help & Support' section ma troubleshooting steps provide cha. Common issues include incorrect password, outdated app version, ya account lock. Tapaiko account ID: APP12345 ko reset link tapaiko email 10th January 2025 ma pathaune bhaeko cha. App update pachi pani problem solve na bhaye, 'Report Issue' option use garnuhos.
answer: Mobile app login issue solve 'Help & Support' section ma steps follow ya password reset garera garna milcha.

question: Courier package ko wrong delivery address update bhaye, ke garne?
context: Wrong delivery address update problem ko lagi, 'Modify Address' section ma complaint file garnuhos. Tapaiko courier ID: COURIER12345 ko delivery 12th January 2025 ma attempt bhaeko thiyo, tara incorrect address ma pathaune ko karan delivery fail bhaeko cha. Correct address provide pachi 2-3 din ma reattempt huncha. Delivery partner ko helpline ma samparka garna milcha urgent delivery ko lagi.
answer: Courier address update 'Modify Address' section ma correct address submit garera garna milcha.

question: Credit card ka reward points kasari redeem garne?
context: Credit card reward points redeem garna, 'Rewards Portal' ma login garera available options (e.g., vouchers, cashback, travel discounts) select garnuhos. Tapaiko card ID: CC123456 ma 10,000 reward points available cha, jun Rs. 2,500 ko equivalent ho. Redeem request complete bhaye pachi, voucher code ya cashback 24-48 hours ma process huncha. Reward points expire date 31st March 2025 ho.
answer: Reward points redeem 'Rewards Portal' ma login garera options select garna milcha.

question: Hospital discharge process kasari huncha?
context: Hospital discharge process ma doctor ko approval, pending bill payment, ra discharge summary collect garna parcha. Tapaiko patient ID: PAT123456 ko discharge date 15th January 2025 confirmed cha. Final bill Rs. 50,000 cha, ra discharge summary counter ma available cha. Any pending test results discharge pachi email ma send garincha. Insurance settlement applicable cha bhane, documents submit garnuhos.
answer: Hospital discharge process ma doctor approval ra bill payment pachi discharge summary collect garna milcha.

question: Real estate property ko site visit kasari book garne?
context: Real estate property ko site visit book garna 'Schedule Visit' portal ma date ra time select garnuhos. Tapaiko inquiry ID: PROP123456 ma preferred date 20th January 2025 request gareko cha. Site visit confirmation SMS ya email dwara 24 hours ma pathaune huncha. Site visit ko lagi transport assistance cha bhane, additional charges lagna sakcha.
answer: Property site visit 'Schedule Visit' portal ma date ra time select garera book garna milcha.
